channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Rensselaer Handbook of Student Rights and Responsibilities (revised 8/28/24)
item.description: Institute staff and student leaders collaborated throughout the summer to revise and update the Rensselaer Handbook of Student Rights and Responsibilities, revised August 28, 2024. The updates derived from the Student Life Committee of the Student Senate or were necessitated by new requirements to comply with the U.S. Department of Education’s amendments to Title IX.
item.author: Students

item.title: Fall 2024 URP Applications Now Being Accepted
item.description: The Office of Undergraduate Education is currently accepting Undergraduate Research Program (URP) applications for the Fall 2024 semester! Through the URP, full- and part-time undergraduate students may pursue research for academic credit or as a paid research assistant working in the labs of world-leading Rensselaer faculty researchers during the academic year.

item.title: “Build a Better Budget” Webinar Scheduled for September 10
item.description: Date: Tuesday, September 10, 2024 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM - As part of The Off-Campus Commons Financial Series, Student Living and Learning has partnered with Broadview Federal Credit Union to present this webinar to help participants get ready to take control of their finances and their future. Enrollment is limited, so be sure to register to reserve your spot!

item.title: Fall 2024 Study Abroad Info Session Slated for September 4
item.description: All undergraduates are welcome to join the Office of International Programs from noon to 1:00PM on Wednesday, September 4 in room 2602 of the Rensselaer Union for a Study Abroad info session and pizza lunch to learn about program opportunities, application procedures, and deadlines.

item.title: Library to Hold Open House for New Undergraduate Students
item.description: All undergraduate students are welcome to stop by the Folsom Library between 2:00PM and 3:30PM on Wednesday, September 4 to learn about Library services and see demos of available resources, and also meet other new students! Attendees can also enter to win raffle prizes from local businesses, grab a free “library swag” bag, and enjoy some free ice cream, too!

item.title: GORP Introduces Stargazing Series
item.description: Date: Friday, September 6, 2024 9:00 PM - 11:00 PM - The Graduate Outdoor Recreation Program is back, and grad students are welcome to join the group for its monthly stargazing trip to Grafton Park.

item.title: Applications Now Open for CMDIS BYOND “Build Your Own Nano Device” Program
item.description: Date: Thursday, August 8, 2024 12:00 AM - Wed , September 4, 2024 5:00 PM - Cleanrooms play a crucial role in various industries, where contamination is minimized or eliminated during various manufacturing processes. The Center for Materials, Devices, and Integrated Systems’ Micro and Nanofabrication Clean Room is offering a program to provide specialized training and knowledge in clean room operations for undergraduate students to build a strong foundation; applications are due by September 4.
item.author: Students

item.title: Nominations Sought for 2024 Founders Award of Excellence
item.description: Date: Tuesday, September 3, 2024 (all day) - The Founders Award Committee is asking for assistance in identifying candidates for Rensselaer’s Founders Award of Excellence, which was established in 1994 to honor students who embody the qualities of creativity, discovery, and leadership, and the values of pride and responsibility at Rensselaer. Nominations should be submitted no later than September 3.

item.title: BME Seminar Scheduled for September 5

item.title: “R as your SuperpoweR!”: RPIrates Monthly Meeting (Weds, 4 Sep, 6p, AE217)
item.description: The RPI R users community is invited to the first RPIrates meeting of the Fall 2024 term! Our topic on Weds, 4 Sep (6p, AE217) will be “R as your SuperpoweR!” led by Dr. John Erickson, Dir. of Research Operations of the Rensselaer FOCI. John has co-taught R-based data analytics courses for nearly a decade; has presented numerous R bootcamps and tutorials; and is the founder of RPIrates: The RPI R Users Group. RPIrates holds monthly meetings featuring great topics, plus pizza and other goodies!

item.title: Faculty/Staff In-Person Workshop to Offer Beta Classroom “Teaching with Technology” Preview
item.description: Date: Tuesday, September 17, 2024 1:00 PM - 2:00 PM - Join the Office of Undergraduate Education’s Maureen Fodera as she discusses Folsom Library’s collaboratory space and the technologies that are available in its Beta Classroom, a high-technology testing space for interactive learning that allows faculty to pilot new, interactive technologies and pedagogical approaches they can recommend for other classrooms. Please register by September 12.

item.title: Office of Strategic Alliances and Translation to Hold “Meet, Greet & Eat!”
item.description:
At 4:00PM on Wednesday, September 4 in the CBIS auditorium, please join the Office of Strategic Alliances and Translation for an OSAT Informational, where they will be unveiling new resources and support for faculty and staff with intellectual property, new ventures, and industry collaborations. President Schmidt will be making opening remarks; a reception will follow the event. Please RSVP to Ashley Jones.
